item.title: Distributing Add-ins via Installer
item.description: Recently I needed to create an installer for my add-ins using Inno Setup installer. Inno Setup is a free ware professional installer. It lets you use Pascal to create special code to help you install the add ins. Luckily, over at Dutch Geminiâ€™s website he has helped with plenty of the code to get there. Very well done, I might add. It looks like he uses a single add-in file for Excel 2003 and below and Excel 2007 and above (for ribbon purposes).
